name: Little Fingers and Ladders
description:
Here's a little game my buddy Mason and I quickly scrapped together for a game jam. Didn't get around to adding items and combat and all that jazz, so just a clone of the board game snakes and ladders.

This project was used to start learning Godot. Source code is available here.

Only uses the keys "A" and "X".  Theme is chaos... because chaos is a ladder.
